title: unable to play
body:
i find myself having to dodge constantly due to the lock in ONLY main one role trolls even though the roles already taken and the usual someone warns us about some one feeding or trolling from the last game they  had then arguements break out 
so the time i have to play league is pretty much used up as the queue time from dodge goes from 5 mins to 30mins ? seriously can someone fix that i dont care about the 3 an 10 LP loss because its better than playing a game that last 30 mins and losing 20 something LP 
but the queue dodging time just consumes all the time i have to actually play the damn game.
then i find myself saying some putrid shit like "u dumb fuks need to fuk off and die" right before i dodge the game because i know i wont get another chance to play it during the day because of the dodge timers cant it just be 5mins -10 mins jumping from 5 to 30 is just honestly ridiculous.

replies.body:
"i find myself having to dodge constantly due to the lock in ONLY main one role trolls even."

There is no actual ruling to against instalocking even if someone did call that role its not actually theirs.

these are ranked games not normals ill explain it like this then
last pick has locked in his champion for mid lane 
even though the 4 people before him whether it be 1st 2nd 3rd 4th have already locked in that role 
not once did i mention a rule against instalockers or people who pick roles already taken previously in the draft 
my problem was the timer 
but thank you for proving a point to me that i never bought up as an issue just the reason leading up to the actual issue i was getting across which was dodge timers
finally a smart player who has read the rules you are a god among men all shall bow before the god bow bow worthless players
Finally someone who actually agreed with me for once instead of crying like a 12 year old cow on salt.

The timers are there for the exact reason to stop people dodging

cool so you're just forced to play with trolls because the other trolls who dodge for the wrong reasons (time wasting others in the pick phase) forced riot to implement those timers for a reason -_- why cant it just be 5 - 10 - 15 - 20 
the jump from 5 to 30 on the 2nd dodge kills me
Until someone finds a way to remove the individuality and ability to have ones own thoughts will we be able to solve your problem. Until then people will continue to decide to be a d1ck.

im asking for the timers to change not the people 
we all know dickheads wont change
But the timers are there so that you avoid encountering the player you're dodging in the next game you queue for.

yes the 5min is understandable but then it jumps to 30mins and im dodging the 2nd game in a row because its a different troll 
so then my time that i do have for game is suddenly gone because if i queue after the 30min ive only got 30mins or 40 max before i have to go do other things
im sure others can relate to this kinda thing no matter what elo you're at
